alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:29PM EDT until July 03 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NEW CASTLE...NORTHWESTERN SALEM...NORTHWESTERN GLOUCESTER AND SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES WILL EXPIRE AT 930 PM EDT... The storm which prompted the warning has moved out of the area. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. However heavy rain is still possible with this thunderstorm. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Delaware...southern New Jersey...and southeastern Pennsylvania. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for northeastern New Castle County in northern Delaware, Salem County and Gloucester County in southern New Jersey until 1000 PM EDT.
